Schema.title: Cancer Genomic Test Standardized Format v1.2.1
Schema.$comment: Copyright (c) 2020 Section of Genomic Data Management, C-CAT.

compositeBiomarkers.title: Composite Biomarkers
compositeBiomarkers.description: Biomarkers consisting of multiple variants or biomarkers.

schemaVersion.title: Schema Version
schemaVersion.description: The schema version of the Cancer Genome Test Results Standardized Format.

comments.title: Comments
comments.description: Comments about variants, biomarkers, and samples.

SequencingSample.title: Sequencing Sample
SequencingSample.description: Information on a sequencing sample (tumor or normal, and DNA or RNA).

itemId.title: Item ID
itemId.description: ID of the sample. This must be a unique string in a file.

tumorOrNormal.title: Tumor or Normal
tumorOrNormal.description: Specimen type, defined as tumor or normal.

totalReadCount.title: Total Read Count
totalReadCount.description: The total number of reads including unmapped reads.

totalMappedReadCount.title: Total Mapped Read Count
totalMappedReadCount.description: The total number of mapped reads.

duplicateReadsPercentage.title: Duplicate Reads Percentage
duplicateReadsPercentage.description: Percentage of duplicate reads in the total reads.

mappedReadsPercentage.title: Mapped Reads Percentage
mappedReadsPercentage.description: Percentage of mapped reads in the total reads.

suspectedSampleStates.title: Suspected Sample States
suspectedSampleStates.description: Suspected DNA or RNA sample states such as "contaminated" and "deaminated" (cytosine deamination in FFPE DNA). An empty array denotes the states are not detected.

name.title: Name
name.description: The release name of the reference genome.

grcRelease.title: GRC Release
grcRelease.description: The GRC (Genome Reference Consortium) release of the reference genome.

descriptions.title: Descriptions
descriptions.description: Descriptions of the reference genome. One value is assigned per sentence.

ConfigOptions.title: Config Options
ConfigOptions.description: Configuration options for annotation and view.

typeLabelsInterpretedAsKbAmplification.title: Type Labels Interpreted as KB Amplification
typeLabelsInterpretedAsKbAmplification.description: Type labels interpreted as copy number amplification in a knowledge base.

typeLabelsInterpretedAsKbLoss.title: Type Labels Interpreted as KB Loss
typeLabelsInterpretedAsKbLoss.description: Type labels interpreted as copy number loss in a knowledge base.

typeLabelsInterpretedAsKbGeneFusion.title: Type Labels Interpreted as KB Gene Fusion
typeLabelsInterpretedAsKbGeneFusion.description: Type labels interpreted as gene fusion in a knowledge base.

enum: rearrangementType: gene fusion and frameshift variant

default: rearrangementType: gene fusion and frameshift variant

typeLabelsInterpretedAsKbDuplication.title: Type Labels Interpreted as KB Duplication
typeLabelsInterpretedAsKbDuplication.description: Type labels interpreted as Duplication in a knowledge base.

typeLabelsInterpretedAsKbDeletion.title: Type Labels Interpreted as KB Deletion
typeLabelsInterpretedAsKbDeletion.description: Type labels interpreted as deletion in a knowledge base.

typeLabelsInterpretedAsKbInversion.title: Type Labels Interpreted as KB Inversion
typeLabelsInterpretedAsKbInversion.description: Type labels interpreted as inversion in a knowledge base.

typeLabelsInterpretedAsKbTruncation.title: Type Labels Interpreted as KB Truncation
typeLabelsInterpretedAsKbTruncation.description: Type labels interpreted as truncation in a knowledge base.

typeLabelsInterpretedAsKbExonSkipping.title: Type Labels Interpreted as KB Exon Skipping
typeLabelsInterpretedAsKbExonSkipping.description: Type labels interpreted as exon skipping in a knowledge base.

typeLabelsInterpretedAsKbRearrangement.title: Type Labels Interpreted as KB Rearrangement
typeLabelsInterpretedAsKbRearrangement.description: Type labels interpreted as (unclassified) rearrangement in a knowledge base.

enum: rearrangementType: gene fusion and frameshift variant

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: A Comment about variants, biomarkers, or samples.

itemIds.title: Item IDs
itemIds.description: "itemID" values of the items commented on. An empty array denotes the comment is not on specific items, but on the case.

contents.title: Contents
contents.description: Notes on the variants. One value is assigned per sentence, and line breaks are ignored.

testId.title: Test ID
testId.description: Arbitrary test ID assigned by the clinical laboratory service.

testType.title: Test Type
testType.description: The test type defined by DNA or RNA sequencing samples.

targetRegionVersion.title: Target Region Version
targetRegionVersion.description: The version of the target region.

softwareName.title: Software Name
softwareName.description: The name of the analytical software.

softwareVersion.title: Software Version
softwareVersion.description: The version of the analytical software.

panelName.title: Panel Name
panelName.description: The name of the gene panel.

panelVersion.title: Panel Version
panelVersion.description: The version of the gene panel.

testForReferenceOnly.title: Test For Reference Only
testForReferenceOnly.description: Whether or not the test is for reference puropse only.

shortVariants.title: Short Variants
shortVariants.description: Results of SNV (single nucleotide variant), insertion, deletion, and delins.

ShortVariant.title: Short Variants
ShortVariant.description: Short variant including SNV, insertion, deletion, or delins.

itemId.title: Item ID
itemId.description: ID of the variant. This must be a unique string in a file.

position.title: Position
position.description: The chromosomal position, with the 1st base having position 1 (1-based).

referenceAllele.title: Reference Allele
referenceAllele.description: The reference allele at the position.

alternateAllele.title: Alternate Allele
alternateAllele.description: The alternate allele at the position.

alternateAlleleFrequency.title: Alternate Allele Frequency
alternateAlleleFrequency.description: The alternate (variant) allele frequency at the position.

totalReadDepth.title: Total Read Depth
totalReadDepth.description: The total read depth at the position.

alternateAlleleReadDepth.title: Alternate Allele Read Depth
alternateAlleleReadDepth.description: The read depth of the alternate allele.

variantType.title: Variant Type
variantType.description: Variant type such as SNV and insertion.

sampleItemId.title: Sample Item ID
sampleItemId.description: The item ID of the samples with the variant.

matched.title: Matched
matched.description: Whether or not the variant is identified using both tumor and matched-normal samples.

reported.title: Reported
reported.description: Whether or not to include the variant in a report.

transcriptId.title: Transcript ID
transcriptId.description: Transcript ID. This is highly recommended to be an ID with the sub-number (e.g., "NM_000368.4").

transcriptDatabaseName.title: Transcript Database Name
transcriptDatabaseName.description: The database name of the transcript IDs.

transcriptDatabaseVersion.title: Transcript Database Version
transcriptDatabaseVersion.description: The version of the transcript database.

geneSymbol.title: Gene Symbol
geneSymbol.description: Gene symbol, as written in a test result report. Null denotes there is no gene in the region.

strand.title: Strand
strand.description: Strand, defined as + (forward) or - (reverse). Null denotes the strand is not determined.

cdsChange.title: CDS Change
cdsChange.description: Change at DNA level, as written in a test result report. This is recommended to be notated in HGVS. Null denotes there is no change.

aminoAcidsChange.title: Amino Acids Change
aminoAcidsChange.description: Amino acid change, as written in a test result report. This is recommended to be notated in HGVS. Null denotes there is no change.

calculatedEffects.title: Calculated Effects
calculatedEffects.description: Predicted effects. Each element of the array must be a single term of the Sequence Ontology (http://www.sequenceontology.org/).

itemId.title: Item ID
itemId.description: ID of the variant. This must be a unique string in a file.

startPosition.title: Start Position
startPosition.description: The start chromosomal position of the alteration, with the 1st base having position 1 (1-based).

endPosition.title: End Position
endPosition.description: The end chromosomal position of the alteration, with the 1st base having position 1 (1-based).

copyNumberMetrics.title: Copy Number Metrics
copyNumberMetrics.description: The values and the units of the copy number alteration.

copyNumberAlterationType.title: Copy Number Alteration Type
copyNumberAlterationType.description: Copy number alteration type such as amplification and loss.

sampleItemId.title: Sample Item ID
sampleItemId.description: The item ID of the samples with the variant.

matched.title: Matched
matched.description: Whether or not the variant is identified using both tumor and matched-normal samples.

reported.title: Reported
reported.description: Whether or not to include the variant in a report.

RearrangementTranscript.title: Rearrangement Transcript
RearrangementTranscript.description: Transcript of a rearrangement or a copy number alteration.

transcriptId.title: Transcript ID
transcriptId.description: Transcript ID. This is highly recommended to be an ID with the sub-number (e.g., "NM_000368.4").

transcriptDatabaseName.title: Transcript Database Name
transcriptDatabaseName.description: The database name of the transcript IDs.

transcriptDatabaseVersion.title: Transcript Database Version
transcriptDatabaseVersion.description: The version of the transcript database.

geneSymbol.title: Gene Symbol
geneSymbol.description: Gene symbol, as written in a test result report. Null denotes there is no gene in the region.

strand.title: Strand
strand.description: Strand, defined as + (forward) or - (reverse). Null denotes the strand is not determined.

cdsChange.title: CDS Change
cdsChange.description: Change at DNA level, as written in a test result report. This is recommended to be notated in HGVS. Null denotes there is no change.

aminoAcidsChange.title: Amino Acids Change
aminoAcidsChange.description: Amino acid change, as written in a test result report. This is recommended to be notated in HGVS. Null denotes there is no change.

calculatedEffects.title: Calculated Effects
calculatedEffects.description: Predicted effects. Each element of the array must be a single term of the Sequence Ontology (http://www.sequenceontology.org/).

Rearrangement.title: Rearrangement
Rearrangement.description: Chromosomal rearrangement, structural variation, or splice variant.

itemId.title: Item ID
itemId.description: ID of the variant. This must be a unique string in a file.

breakends.title: Breakends
breakends.description: The two breakends of the rearrangement.

insertedSequence.title: Inserted Sequence
insertedSequence.description: Inserted sequence between the two breakends on the genome sequence. Null denotes no sequence inserted.

supportingReadCount.title: Supporting Read Count
supportingReadCount.description: The count of the sequencing reads supoorting the rearrangement.

totalReadCount.title: Total Read Count
totalReadCount.description: The total count of the sequencing reads at the breakends.

alternateAlleleFrequency.title: Alternate Allele Frequency
alternateAlleleFrequency.description: The alternate (variant) allele frequency of the rearrangement.

expressionLevelMetrics.title: Expression Level Metrics
expressionLevelMetrics.description: The values and the units of the expression levels.

orderedGenePairs.title: Gene Pair Orders
orderedGenePairs.description: The transcriptionally ordered pairs of the genes that straddle the breakends. The gene symbols must be included in the transcript objects of the breakends. If this key is absent, the gene pairs are treated without the directional information.

rearrangementNames.title: Rearrangement Names
rearrangementNames.description: The names (short descriptions) of the rearrangement.

rearrangementType.title: Rearrangement Type
rearrangementType.description: The rearrangement type such as gene fusion and deletion (large deletion).

sampleItemId.title: Sample Item ID
sampleItemId.description: The item ID of the samples with the variant.

matched.title: Matched
matched.description: Whether or not the variant is identified using both tumor and matched-normal samples.

reported.title: Reported
reported.description: Whether or not to include the variant in a report.

startPosition.title: Start Position
startPosition.description: The start chromosomal position of the breakend, with the 1st base having position 1 (1-based).

endPosition.title: End Position
endPosition.description: The end chromosomal position of the breakend, with the 1st base having position 1 (1-based).

matePieceLocation.title: Mate Piece Location
matePieceLocation.description: Whether the mate piece is located upstream or downstream of the breakend on the reference sequence (the upstream/downstream are NOT those on a transcript sequence). In the case of a gene fusion or another rearrangement, the value is highly recommended to be specified.

supportingReadCount.title: Supporting Read Count
supportingReadCount.description: The count of the sequencing reads supoorting the rearrangement at the breakend.

totalReadCount.title: Total Read Count
totalReadCount.description: The total count of the sequencing reads at the breakend.

alternateAlleleFrequency.title: Alternate Allele Frequency
alternateAlleleFrequency.description: The alternate (variant) allele frequency at the breakend.

statisticType.title: Statistic Type
statisticType.description: Statistic type of the value. Null denotes the value is not a summary statistic.

sampleSize.title: Sample Size
sampleSize.description: The size of the samples used to calculate the summary statistic.

isControl.title: Is Control
isControl.description: Whether or not the value is from a control group.

transcriptId.title: Transcript ID
transcriptId.description: Transcript ID. This is highly recommended to be an ID with the sub-number (e.g., "NM_000368.4").

transcriptDatabaseName.title: Transcript Database Name
transcriptDatabaseName.description: The database name of the transcript IDs.

transcriptDatabaseVersion.title: Transcript Database Version
transcriptDatabaseVersion.description: The version of the transcript database.

geneSymbol.title: Gene Symbol
geneSymbol.description: Gene symbol, as written in a test result report. Null denotes there is no gene in the region.

strand.title: Strand
strand.description: Strand, defined as + (forward) or - (reverse). Null denotes the strand is not determined.

exonRange.title: Exon Range
exonRange.description: Start and end numbers of exons. The start and end exons are included in the range.

itemId.title: Item ID
itemId.description: ID of the biomarker. This must be a unique string in a file.

biomarkerType.title: Biomarker Type
biomarkerType.description: Biomarker type such as TMB and MSI.

biomarkerMetrics.title: Biomarker Metrics
biomarkerMetrics.description: The values and the units of the biomarker.

state.title: State
state.description: The state of the biomarker. Null denotes the state is not detected.

sampleItemId.title: Sample Item ID
sampleItemId.description: The item ID of the samples with the variant.

matched.title: Matched
matched.description: Whether or not the biomarker is identified using both tumor and matched-normal samples.

reported.title: Reported
reported.description: Whether or not to include the biomarker in a report.

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: The unit of the metric. Null denotes the metric has no unit.

CompositeBiomarker.title: Composite Biomarkers
CompositeBiomarker.description: Biomarker consisting of multiple variants or biomarkers.

itemId.title: Item ID
itemId.description: ID of the biomarker. This must be a unique string in a file.

componentItemIds.title: Component Item IDs
componentItemIds.description: The item IDs of the component variants or biomarkers.

biomarkerNames.title: Biomarker Names
biomarkerNames.description: The names (short descriptions) of the biomarker.

descriptions.title: Descriptions
descriptions.description: The long descriptions of the biomarker.

reported.title: Reported
reported.description: Whether or not to include the biomarker in a report.

itemId.title: Item ID
itemId.description: ID of the variant. This must be a unique string in a file.

expressionLevelMetrics.title: Expression Level Metrics
expressionLevelMetrics.description: The values and the units of the expression levels.

sampleItemId.title: Sample Item ID
sampleItemId.description: The item ID of the samples with the variant.

reported.title: Reported
reported.description: Whether or not to include the variant in a report.

itemId.title: Item ID
itemId.description: ID of the biomarker. This must be a unique string in a file.

contentMetrics.title: Content Metrics
contentMetrics.description: The values and the units of the content.

sampleItemId.title: Sample Item ID
sampleItemId.description: The item ID of the samples with the variant.

reported.title: Reported
reported.description: Whether or not to include the content in a report.
